gw.ab.addressbook.entity

Interface ABContact

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ABCompany, ABCompanyVendor, ABLegalVenue, ABPerson, ABPersonVendor, ABPlace

    public interface ABContact
    ABContact Generic contact (either a person or a company).

      • clearAllCategoryScores

        void clearAllCategoryScores()
        Clears all categoryscores associated with this contact. Should be used with caution.

      • getExternalUpdateApp

        Returns:
        the name of the remote application updating this via remote API call.

      • setExternalUpdateApp

        Parameters:
        callingApp - sets a property intended to store the name of the remote application updating this via remote API call.

        Parameters:

      • copyNonPersisting

        <T extends Bean> T copyNonPersisting(T bean)
        Shallowly copies and marks a bean as not persisting, i.e. the bean will not be committed.
        Parameters:
        bean - The bean to be copied and marked
        Returns:
        The copied and marked bean

      • deepCopyNonPersisting

        ABContact deepCopyNonPersisting()
        Deeply copies this contact and marks the copy as not persisting, i.e. it will not be committed.
        Returns:
        The copied and marked bean

      • replaceWith

        void replaceWith(ABContact keptContact)
        Replaces this contact with keptContact. This causes this contact to be removed and triggers a merge message rather than a remove message for the replaced contact.
        Parameters:
        keptContact - the contact that is replacing this one.

      • getReplacementContact

        ABContact getReplacementContact()
        Returns:
        Returns the contact that replaced this contact via the replaceWith method. Returns null if there isn't one.

      • getHasPendingUpdates

        java.lang.Boolean getHasPendingUpdates()
        Returns:
        Returns whether there are PendingContactUpdates for this ABContact

      • getSpecialistServices

        java.util.List<SpecialistService> getSpecialistServices()
        Returns the Contact's services. The list returned is constructed so modifying the returned list does not modify the contact's services.
        Returns:
        The Contact's services

      • setSpecialistServices

        void setSpecialistServices(java.util.List<SpecialistService> services)
        Sets The contact's services
        Parameters:
        services - The Contact's services

      • addContactByRelationship

        void addContactByRelationship(ContactBidiRel relationship,
                              ABContact contact)
                       throws com.guidewire.pl.domain.addressbook.ContactRelationshipValidationException
        Adds the given contact to this contact with the given relationship. Does nothing if the relationship already exists. Returns a failure message if the Contact could not be added because it violated some relationship constraint.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.domain.addressbook.ContactRelationshipValidationException

      • getAllAddresses

        Address[] getAllAddresses()
        Gets all the Contact's Addresses. Includes the primary Address and secondary Addresses.

      • getSecondaryAddresses

        Address[] getSecondaryAddresses()
        Gets all the Contact's secondary Addresses.

      • makePrimaryAddress

        void makePrimaryAddress(Address address)
        Make a specified address the primary address. Old primary address will move to secondary addresses. Sepcifed address can be new or an existing secondary-address. Address will be removed from secondary addresses if found.

      • removeAddress

        void removeAddress(Address address)
        Removes the given Address from the Contact. Does nothing if the Contact does not have the given Address.

      • addAddress

        void addAddress(Address address)
        Adds the given address. Does nothing if the Address already exists on the Contact (either as the Primary Address or in the Contact Addresses array). Adds as primary if no primary exists.

      • addContactContact

        void addContactContact(ABContactContact contactContact)

      • removeContactContact

        void removeContactContact(ABContactContact contactContact)

      • getAllContactContacts

        ABContactContact[] getAllContactContacts()

      • getPossibleBidiRelsToContact

        ContactBidiRel[] getPossibleBidiRelsToContact(ABContact otherContact)
        Parameters:
        otherContact - If null then then delegating to getPossibleBidiRels();

      • isVendor

        boolean isVendor()
        Returns:
        True if the contact is a vendor, i.e. it has the Vendor tag.

      • getDocuments

        Document[] getDocuments()
        Return the list of documents linked to the contact
        Returns:
        list of documents associated to the contact

      • addToDocuments

        void addToDocuments(Document document)
             throws DuplicateKeyException
        Link the document to the ABContact using the ABContactDocumentLink join array. It is expected that the document bundle will be committed after the transaction.
        Parameters:
        document - to link to the contact; it need not be in the ABContact's bundle
        Throws:
        DuplicateKeyException

      • addToDocuments

        void addToDocuments(Document[] documents)
             throws DuplicateKeyException
        Link the documents to the ABContact using the ABContactDocumentLink join array. It is expected that the documents' bundle will be committed after the transaction.
        Parameters:
        documents - to link to the contact; it need not be in the ABContact's bundle
        Throws:
        DuplicateKeyException

      • removeFromDocuments

        void removeFromDocuments(Document document)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Unlink the document from the ABContact by removing the entry in the ABContactDocumentLink join array It is expected that the document bundle will be committed after the transaction.
        Parameters:
        document - to unlink from contact; it need not be in the ABContact's bundle
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified document is not found
        java.rmi.RemoteException
